comment: Properties of a pair of a one-to-one function into the set of indices of edges and a function into the set of vertices to be a trail in a pseudograph. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 20-Oct-2017.) (Revised by AV, 7-Jan-2021.) (Revised by AV, 29-Oct-2021.)
